xmlText.p: First Period_1, Dallas, Shore 6 (Lindell, Klingberg), 15:45 (pp). Penalties_Roussel, DAL, Major (fighting), 3:48; Yandle, FLA, Major (fighting), 3:48; Haley, FLA, served by Bjugstad, (instigator), 5:49; Faksa, DAL, Major (fighting), 5:49; Haley, FLA, Major (fighting), 5:49; Haley, FLA, Misconduct (misconduct), 5:49; Ekblad, FLA, (roughing), 7:59; Radulov, DAL, (roughing), 7:59; Seguin, DAL, (roughing), 7:59; Lindell, DAL, (high sticking), 12:11; MacKenzie, FLA, Major (fighting), 14:25; Heatherington, DAL, Major (fighting), 14:25; Faksa, DAL, Major (fighting), 14:25; Petrovic, FLA, Major (fighting), 14:25; Petrovic, FLA, served by Bjugstad, (roughing), 14:25; Petrovic, FLA, Misconduct (misconduct), 14:25; Heatherington, DAL, Misconduct (misconduct), 14:25; Dickinson, DAL, (tripping), 16:31.

Second Period_2, Dallas, Benn 20 (Pateryn, Radulov), 6:43. 3, Dallas, Radulov 19 (Spezza, Seguin), 9:57 (pp). 4, Florida, Ekblad 9 (Malgin, Bjugstad), 15:47 (pp). Penalties_Haley, FLA, (cross checking), 9:09; Trocheck, FLA, (tripping), 9:47; Dickinson, DAL, (high sticking), 13:50; Haley, FLA, Misconduct (misconduct), 13:50; Haley, FLA, Misconduct (misconduct), 13:50; Brickley, FLA, (high sticking), 19:51.

Third Period_5, Dallas, Janmark 13 (Klingberg, Shore), 5:16. 6, Dallas, Radulov 20, 12:06. 7, Dallas, Pitlick 9 (Hamhuis, Roussel), 12:26. Penalties_Faksa, DAL, (elbowing), 3:14; Lindell, DAL, (interference), 15:12; Dadonov, FLA, (boarding), 15:17; Brickley, FLA, Major (fighting), 17:38; Ritchie, DAL, Major (fighting), 17:38; McGinn, FLA, Major (fighting), 18:01; Johns, DAL, Major (fighting), 18:01.
Goalies_Florida, Reimer 13-12-5 (3 shots-3 saves), Sateri 0-1-0 (36-30). Dallas, Bishop 20-12-3 (34-33).
Referees_Frederick L'Ecuyer, Wes McCauley. Linesmen_Michel Cormier, Shane Heyer.
